signingV4Tests.description: Slashes in object name should not be URL encoded
Forward Slashes should not be stripped

signingV4Tests.expectedCanonicalRequest:
GET
/test-bucket/test-object
X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=test-iam-credentials%40dummy-project-id.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20190201%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20190201T090000Z&X-Goog-Expires=10&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=bar%3Bfoo%3Bhost
bar:BAR-value
foo:foo-value
host:storage.googleapis.com

bar;foo;host
UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD

GET
/test-bucket/test-object
X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=test-iam-credentials%40dummy-project-id.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20190201%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20190201T090000Z&X-Goog-Expires=10&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=collapsed%3Bhost%3Bleading%3Btabs%3Btrailing
collapsed:abc def
host:storage.googleapis.com
leading:xyz
tabs:abc def
trailing:abc

collapsed;host;leading;tabs;trailing
UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD

signingV4Tests.description: Header value with multiple inline values
signingV4Tests.expectedCanonicalRequest:
GET
/test-bucket/test-object
X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=test-iam-credentials%40dummy-project-id.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20190201%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20190201T090000Z&X-Goog-Expires=10&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host%3Bmultiple
host:storage.googleapis.com
multiple:xyz , abc, def , xyz

host;multiple
UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD

GET
/test-bucket/test-object
X-Goog-Algorithm=GOOG4-RSA-SHA256&X-Goog-Credential=test-iam-credentials%40dummy-project-id.iam.gserviceaccount.com%2F20190201%2Fauto%2Fstorage%2Fgoog4_request&X-Goog-Date=20190201T090000Z&X-Goog-Expires=10&X-Goog-SignedHeaders=host%3Bx-goog-encryption-algorithm%3Bx-goog-encryption-key%3Bx-goog-encryption-key-sha256
host:storage.googleapis.com
x-goog-encryption-algorithm:AES256
x-goog-encryption-key:key
x-goog-encryption-key-sha256:key-hash

host;x-goog-encryption-algorithm;x-goog-encryption-key;x-goog-encryption-key-sha256
UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD
